subject: My Life As A Tree
text:
My life as a tree.
 Truly pleases me.
 I have very deep roots,
 and bear lots of fruit!
 I started out small,
 but have got very tall.
 With plenty of leaves
 to sway in the breeze!
 And my mighty limbs
 are just like a gym!
 So don't just walk by,
 give this tree a try!
 You will never regret 
 this tree you just met!
 My friendship is here
 through all of the year.
 My life as a tree
 Truly pleases me!
